description: This Python source file defines a ProxyService class responsible for forwarding HTTP requests to an upstream Django application. It handles request construction, error handling, and response parsing.

classes.name: ProxyService
classes.description: A service class that forwards HTTP requests to an upstream server and manages responses and errors.

methods.name: __init__(self, base_url: str, session: Optional[requests.Session] = None)
methods.description: Initializes the ProxyService with a base URL and an optional requests.Session object.

methods.name: Tuple[Any,int] forward(self, method: str, path: str, params: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, json: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None)
methods.description: Forwards an HTTP request to the upstream server and returns the JSON data and status code, handling errors and response content types.

ctags.name: __init__
ctags.pattern: /^    def __init__(self, base_url: str, session: Optional[requests.Session] = None):$/

ctags.name: forward
ctags.pattern: /^    def forward(self, method: str, path: str, params: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, json: Opt/
ctags.signature: (self, method: str, path: str, params: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, json: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None)
